data.introduce: PNR 授权,可以给另一个 PNR 授权，或者将已授权的返还回去。
data.business: PNR授权,可以给另一个PNR授权，或者将已授权的返还回去。
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TES_AirPNRAuthPushRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"预定信息验证请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PushAuthorityParam","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"PushBean","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机选项","children":[{"name":"@Office","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"被 授 权 的
Office 号","children":[]},{"name":"@IsIncludeIdentityInfo","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"证件信息","children":[]},{"name":"@IsIncludeContactInfo","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"联系信息","children":[]},{"name":"@IsIncludeTicketPriceInfo","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"运价信息","children":[]},{"name":"@PushBack","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"将权限退回
给授权方","children":[]},{"name":"@PushReadOrWritePermission","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"读权限或写
权限","children":[]}]},{"name":"@PassengerNameRecord","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR 号","children":[]},{"name":"@OrderId","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"研发订单号","children":[]}]}]}]

data.errorCodes: [{"code":-303,"name":"","msg":"inner service error","msgZh":"内部服务异常"},{"code":-304,"name":"","msg":"sending commands too fast, try again later","msgZh":"访问速度过快,请稍后再试"},{"code":-305,"name":"","msg":"transaction times limited","msgZh":"访问次数限制"},{"code":-301,"name":"","msg":"office permission denied","msgZh":"Office 没有权限"},{"code":-390,"name":"","msg":"IBE Service Error","msgZh":"IBE 服务异常"},{"code":-311,"name":"","msg":"time out, please try again later","msgZh":"操作超时，请稍后再试"},{"code":-306,"name":"","msg":"too many concurrent request for service","msgZh":"访问频率限制"},{"code":-1,"name":"","msg":"Biz Error","msgZh":"业务异常"},{"code":-400,"name":"","msg":"format of xml string is not valid","msgZh":"xml内容格式错误"},{"code":-402,"name":"","msg":"Input error!","msgZh":"输入参数出错"},{"code":403,"name":"","msg":"","msgZh":"用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限"}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<TES_AirPNRAuthPushRQ>
    <POS>
        <!-- Office号 -->
        <Source PseudoCityCode="SHA384"/>
    </POS>
    <PushAuthorityParam PassengerNameRecord="HNWXCB" OrderId="">
        <PushBean Office="SHA717" IsIncludeIdentityInfo="" IsIncludeContactInfo="" IsIncludeTicketPriceInfo=""
                  PushBack="" PushReadOrWritePermission=""/>
    </PushAuthorityParam>
</TES_AirPNRAuthPushRQ>
